title: Evil Will Prevail
description:
Krishna Janmashtami (Jan-mosh-tuh-me) is an important Hindu celebration. It marks the birth of Lord Krishna, an avatar of the Lord Vishnu (Vish-new) , and the intention of ridding the people from the tyranny of King Kansa (Con-za). It was envisioned as the embodiment of good versus evil. Yet somehow, as you will see, evil always finds a way to prevail ...

First, eyes that stalk in the night
Followed by paranoia underlined with a death-stroke 
Then, literally, being blinded by evil 
Finally in our featured story, death lurks in the Banyan trees

Download Best Fiends today for FREE on the App Store or Google Play
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
